Title: SilverMouse - Silverlight Mouse Extensions Library
Description:
SilverMouse add many features to Silverlight input system:

- right mouse button events support
- left mouse button events extensions
- attach and dettached events with extended methods
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SilverMouse add many features to Silverlight input system:

- right mouse button events support
- left mouse button events extensions
- attach and dettached events with extended methods


Add mouse extensions to your application:

1. Set "windowless" parameter of Silverlight plug-in object to "true"

2. Add reference to SilverMouse library

3. Add "using MoonRainbow.Input.Mouse"

4. Using extended method to add event handlers
